description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名士，太尉崔烈之子，崔钧之弟。与诸葛亮、徐庶为友。
description.en: A scholar from the late Eastern Han dynasty, son of the Grand Commandant Cui Lie and younger brother of Cui Jun. He was a friend of Zhuge Liang and Xu Shu.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继西汉之后的大一统王朝，与西汉统称汉朝。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history following the Western Han, collectively known as the Han dynasty with the Western Han.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，官至太尉，是崔州平和崔钧的父亲。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as Grand Commandant. He was the father of Cui Zhouping and Cui Jun.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，曾任西河郡太守，是崔州平的哥哥。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as the Grand Administrator of Xihe Commandery. He was the older brother of Cui Zhouping.

description.zh-cn: 中国中古时代的著名士族，以博陵郡为郡望。
description.en: A prominent aristocratic clan in medieval China, originating from Boling Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的一个行政区划。
description.en: An administrative division during the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 崔州平的籍贯所在地，位于博陵郡，今属河北省。
description.en: Cui Zhouping's ancestral home, located in Boling Commandery, now part of Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的郡名，崔钧曾在此担任太守。
description.en: A commandery in ancient China where Cui Jun once served as Grand Administrator.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，杰出的政治家、军事家。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, an outstanding statesman and military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期的人物，曾为刘备谋士，后归曹操。
description.en: A figure from the late Eastern Han dynasty to the Three Kingdoms period, who once served as an advisor to Liu Bei before joining Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 位于襄阳的一条河流，崔州平和徐庶的故居在其北面。
description.en: A river in Xiangyang, north of which were the former residences of Cui Zhouping and Xu Shu.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典四大名著之一，描述了从东汉末年到西晋初年之间的历史故事。
description.en: One of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature, describing the historical events from the late Eastern Han dynasty to the early Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

en: Three visits to the thatched cottage

description.zh-cn: 刘备三次亲自到诸葛亮的住处拜访，请他出山辅佐的事件。
description.en: The event in which Liu Bei personally visited Zhuge Liang's residence three times to persuade him to become his advisor.

description.zh-cn: 根据史料记载，崔州平是崔烈的儿子。
description.en: According to historical records, Cui Zhouping was the son of Cui Lie.

description.zh-cn: 根据史料记载，崔钧是崔烈的儿子。
description.en: According to historical records, Cui Jun was the son of Cui Lie.

description.zh-cn: 根据史料记载，崔州平是崔钧的弟弟。
description.en: According to historical records, Cui Zhouping was the younger brother of Cui Jun.

description.zh-cn: 崔州平出身于博陵崔氏士族。
description.en: Cui Zhouping came from the aristocratic Cui clan of Boling.

description.zh-cn: 崔州平的籍贯为博陵郡安平县。
description.en: Cui Zhouping's ancestral home was Anping County, Boling Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 崔烈在东汉官至太尉。
description.en: Cui Lie served as the Grand Commandant in the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 崔钧在东汉担任西河郡太守。
description.en: Cui Jun served as the Grand Administrator of Xihe Commandery in the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 崔州平与诸葛亮交情深厚，是少数在诸葛亮躬耕南阳时就认可其才能的人之一。
description.en: Cui Zhouping had a deep friendship with Zhuge Liang and was one of the few who recognized his talents when Zhuge Liang was living in seclusion in Nanyang.

description.zh-cn: 崔州平与徐庶、诸葛亮是好友。
description.en: Cui Zhouping was a good friend of Xu Shu and Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 徐庶与崔州平、诸葛亮是好友，他们都认可诸葛亮的才能。
description.en: Xu Shu was a good friend of Cui Zhouping and Zhuge Liang, and they all recognized Zhuge Liang's talents.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，刘备在“三顾茅庐”期间第一次拜访诸葛亮时遇见了崔州平。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Liu Bei met Cui Zhouping during his first visit to Zhuge Liang's cottage.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，在刘备第二次拜访诸葛亮时，因崔州平与诸葛亮一同出游，导致刘备未能见到诸葛亮。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', during Liu Bei's second visit, he was unable to meet Zhuge Liang because Cui Zhouping and Zhuge Liang were out together.
